entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 8.
